body_content.explanation: the quality of being intelligent, or able to think quickly or intelligently in difficult situations:
examples: He's always had great maturity and smartness.
Celebrities generally aren’t associated with smartness.

body_content.explanation: the quality of having a clean, tidy, and stylish appearance:
examples: The jacket adds a touch of smartness.
The smartness of his attire made me wonder if he was going to the theatre after work.

body_content.explanation: (of a place or event) the quality of being attractive to fashionable, stylish, or rich people :
examples: She loves the smartness of the shops in this part of town.
The company agreed to transform a handful of locations in San Francisco into paragons of smartness and sustainability.
